bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the Territory of Washington

body.p: In the matter of the } application of John Dugan for a writ of Habeas Corpus.

This cause coming on for hearing before me this 2nd day of July 1887 on the of the Sheriff to the court of Habeas Corpus, it was stipulated wherein the prosecuting attorney W.C. Jones and counsel for the prisoner Mess Turner + Forster on that the court should consider the evidence taken before the committing magistrate in the case of the Territory vs. Mary Teller as the only evidence against the petitioner, and the court having heard said testimony read and listened to arguments of counsel, it appears to the court that there was not probable cause to believe the petitioner fully of the crime with which he stands charged, It is therefor ordered that said petitioner be discharged from further custody under the commitment issued by F.W. Pierce, Justice of the peace &, holding the said peitiotner a accessory to the murder of Frank Teller, and in further appearing to the courts, that said petitioner is held under a further commitment issued by June 9, Booge, Justice of the Peace &, as a witness in the case of The Territory vs Mary Teller,

in default of said writ in the sum of one thousand dollars, and in appearing to the court that said bail in excessive it is ordered that said bail be reduced to the sum of two hundred and fifty-dollars and that when said petitioner shall give and with to the of the sheriff in said sum of $250.00 to appear as a witness in said cause at the next term of court and from term to term thereafter until duly discharged, then that the said petitioner be discharged from custody and permitted to go at liberty
Dated this 2d day of July, 1887 George Turner, Judge
Serving 1.00 Attending Court 3.00 Milage 32 miles 3.20 Returning .20 Railroad fair from Cheney 2.00 Bringing prisoner into court 1.00 Cash paid out totell 2.00 $12.45
